mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS row_num, inner_query.* FROM ( SELECT r.REPORTER_IDX, reporter.USER_NICK AS REPORTER_NICK, r.REPORTED_IDX, reported.USER_NICK AS REPORTED_NICK, r.REPORT_REASON, r.STATUS, r.REPORT_DATE, r.USER_REPORT_IDX FROM USER_REPORT r JOIN USER_TABLE reporter ON r.REPORTER_IDX = reporter.USER_IDX JOIN USER_TABLE reported ON r.REPORTED_IDX = reported.USER_IDX ORDER BY r.REPORT_DATE DESC ) inner_query WHERE ROWNUM < #{offset} + #{limit} ) WHERE row_num > #{offset}
